serviceOverview.title: What I do
serviceOverview.intro: A meticulous, highly skilled UI/UX Designer and Senior Front End Developer with 12+ years of commercial experience in designing and building interactive responsive websites and software applications.

articles.title: Outsourcing
articles.body: Are you finding yourself with limited time or resource? I can help ease the load.

articles.title: Contracting
articles.body: I am always on the lookout for my next role as a Senior Front End Developer.

articles.title: Freelance
articles.body: I can help your small business refresh your current website or start a new project.

clients.title: Who I work with
clients.intro: Throughout my contracting and freelancing career I have worked with a number of different agencies and organisations. Below are just a few of the clients I have worked with in the past.

whyChooseMe.title: Why choose me?
whyChooseMe.intro: I am a highly adaptable, creative problem solver, with keen desire to improve and develop new skills. I am quick to respond to an ever changing landscape and used to working in a fast paced environment and offer a wealth of knowledge and experience from my work across several different sectors.

articles.title: Adaptable
articles.body: I adapt very quickly to fit in with your business, meaning you spend more time on what's important to you.

articles.title: Reliable
articles.body: I am trusted by award winning agencies to deliver products that meets their exacting standards.

articles.title: Pioneering
articles.body: I am always learning new development technologies and design practices to better improve on my knowledge.

skills.title: What I use
skills.intro: I am always learning new skills and technologies through my own projects, freelancing and online tutorials and courses. I find this helps with settling in to new contract roles and being able to bring new development practices to the table.

cv.title: Curriculum Vitae
cv.intro: I am highly creative, passionate, hard-working freelance UI/UX Designer and Front End Developer with over 12 years commercial experience. I am open to contracting opportunities and you can download my CV's below. References and examples of my work are available upon request.

homePageContent.mastheadBody: Based in Leamington Spa, Warwickshire, I offer digital design and development services for agencies looking to outsource projects, work as a full-time contractor for large organisations and agencies, as well as individuals and small businesses looking to create a web presence.

aboutPageContent.mastheadBody: Based in Leamington Spa, Warwickshire, I offer a range of digital services, as both a full-time contractor and highly skilled freelancer. With over 12 years of experience in both UI/UX Design and Front End Development I can take projects through from initial conception, right through to development and beyond, working as either a lone-gun or as part of a team, I fit into your current working structure seamlessly.

services.title: Outsourcing
services.body:
Sometimes either there is no time or no resource to complete all projects on time at a high standard. By outsourcing your projects to me, this frees you up to concentrate on more important matters. You can be safe in the knowledge that the product will be delivered to your exacting standards on time.

I offer a range of skills and have experience working on large brands so whether you are a small design agency or a large software house, I can help.

All of my work is conducted using latest development technologies and with strict web and browser standards in mind. I also have a wealth of experience working with CMS and E-Commerce solutions. Pixel perfect is my middle name.

services.title: Contracting
services.body:
I am also available as a contractor, working either as a UI/UX Designer working on innovative designs or as a frontend developer pushing boundaries with new technology though HTML5/CSS3 and responsive web design. I also have experience working with OO Javascript and frameworks such as AngularJS and React.

I have worked in-house at award winning design agencies and multinational companies and integrate seamlessly with your working practices and ethos and adapt very quickly - I have experience working on both ASP.NET MVC and JAVA platforms.

Due to my dual skillset of design and development I find that I am uniquely positioned for contract work, where time is money and having both design and development resource, for the price of one, is of great advantage.
